tool_description: Analyzes customer behavior and segments to understand price sensitivity and purchasing patterns across different customer groups.

segmentation_criteria.description: Criteria for customer segmentation: demographic, behavioral, geographic, or value-based

analysis_period_start.description: Start date for customer behavior analysis

analysis_period_end.description: End date for customer behavior analysis

minimum_transactions.description: Minimum number of transactions required for customer inclusion

segment_count.description: Target number of customer segments to create

error_messages: Invalid segmentation criteria: Must be one of [demographic, behavioral, geographic, value-based].
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 datetime strings.
Invalid minimum transactions: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 100.
Invalid segment count: Must be between 2 and 20 segments.
Insufficient customer data: Not enough customers meet the minimum transaction criteria for segmentation.
usage: Choose segmentation_criteria and specify analysis date range. Adjust minimum_transactions to filter active customers and segment_count for desired granularity.

segments_created.description: Actual number of customer segments created

customers_analyzed.description: Total number of customers included in analysis

segment_size_distribution.description: Percentage distribution of customers across segments
